    StaticConfig
    A non-static facade for static fields in Configuration It was created only to keep backward compatibility in Selenide 5.0.0: every time when somebody modifies, say, Configuration.timeout, it will immediately reflect in StaticConfig.timeout() This class should not be normally used in end user's code.
    StaticDriver
    A `Driver` implementation which uses thread-local webdriver and proxy from `WebDriverRunner`.

Package com.codeborne.selenide.impl Description

Implementation details of Selenide library. Selenide is designed so that you can you override any single piece of its logic. For example, to override the logic of taking screenshots one can override class: 
 Screenshots.screenshots = new ScreenShotLaboratory() {
    @Override
   protected File savePageImageToFile(String fileName, WebDriver webdriver) {
     // your custom logic
   }
 };
NB! But "com.codeborne.selenide.impl" package is subject to change. It's up to you to maintain your overridden logic.
